currentFile.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<?import javafx.geometry.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.text.*?>
<BorderPane prefHeight="700.0" prefWidth="1000.0" styleClass="root" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12"
            xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.papel.imdb_clone.controllers.MainController">

    <!-- Top Menu Bar -->
    <top>
        <MenuBar>
            <menus>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="File">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Import Data"/>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Export Data"/>
                        <SeparatorMenuItem mnemonicParsing="false"/>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Exit"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Edit">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Preferences"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Help">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="About"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
            </menus>
        </MenuBar>
    </top>

    <!-- Main Content Area -->
    <center>
        <TabPane styleClass="main-tab-pane" tabClosingPolicy="UNAVAILABLE">
            <tabs>

                <!-- Movies Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="🎬 Movies">
                    <content>
                        <BorderPane>
                            <top>
                                <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="tab-header">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="10.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="15.0"/>
                                    </padding>
                                    <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="Movie Collection">
                                        <font>
                                            <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0"/>
                                        </font>
                                    </Label>
                                    <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                                        <Button onAction="#showAddMovieDialog" styleClass="primary-button"
                                                text="➕ Add Movie"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#showRatingDialog" styleClass="secondary-button"
                                                text="⭐ Rate Movie"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#showMovieDetails" styleClass="secondary-button"
                                                text="📋 View Details"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#addToWatchlist" styleClass="secondary-button"
                                                text="📝 Add to Watchlist"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#deleteMovie" styleClass="danger-button" text="🗑️ Delete"/>
                                        <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                        <Label text="Double-click a movie for details" styleClass="hint-text"/>
                                    </HBox>
                                </VBox>
                            </top>
                            <center>
                                <TableView fx:id="movieTable" styleClass="main-table">
                                    <columnResizePolicy>
                                        <TableView fx:constant="CONSTRAINED_RESIZE_POLICY"/>
                                    </columnResizePolicy>
                                    <placeholder>
                                        <Label text="No movies found. Click 'Add Movie' to get started!"
                                               styleClass="placeholder-text"/>
                                    </placeholder>
                                </TableView>
                            </center>
                        </BorderPane>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Series Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="📺 Series">
                    <content>
                        <BorderPane>
                            <top>
                                <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="tab-header">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="10.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="15.0"/>
                                    </padding>
                                    <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="TV Series Collection">
                                        <font>
                                            <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0"/>
                                        </font>
                                    </Label>
                                    <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                                        <Button onAction="#showAddSeriesDialog" styleClass="primary-button"
                                                text="➕ Add Series"/>
                                        <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                        <Label text="Expand series to view seasons and episodes"
                                               styleClass="hint-text"/>
                                    </HBox>
                                </VBox>
                            </top>
                            <center>
                                <TableView fx:id="seriesTable" styleClass="main-table">
                                    <columns>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesTitleColumn" text="Title" prefWidth="200"/>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesYearColumn" text="Year" prefWidth="80"/>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesGenreColumn" text="Genre" prefWidth="120"/>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesSeasonsColumn" text="Seasons" prefWidth="80"/>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesEpisodesColumn" text="Episodes" prefWidth="80"/>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesImdbColumn" text="IMDB Rating" prefWidth="100"/>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesUserRatingColumn" text="User Rating" prefWidth="100"/>
                                    </columns>
                                    <placeholder>
                                        <Label text="No series found. Click 'Add Series' to get started!"
                                               styleClass="placeholder-text"/>
                                    </placeholder>
                                </TableView>
                            </center>
                        </BorderPane>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Quick Add Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="➕ Quick Add">
                    <content>
                        <VBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="30.0" styleClass="quick-add-container">
                            <padding>
                                <Insets bottom="50.0" left="50.0" right="50.0" top="50.0"/>
                            </padding>

                            <Label styleClass="page-title" text="Quick Add Content">
                                <font>
                                    <Font name="System Bold" size="24.0"/>
                                </font>
                            </Label>

                            <VBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="20.0" styleClass="quick-add-buttons">
                                <Button onAction="#showAddMovieDialog" prefWidth="250.0"
                                        styleClass="large-primary-button" text="🎬 Add New Movie">
                                    <font>
                                        <Font size="16.0"/>
                                    </font>
                                </Button>
                                <Button onAction="#showAddSeriesDialog" prefWidth="250.0"
                                        styleClass="large-primary-button" text="📺 Add New Series">
                                    <font>
                                        <Font size="16.0"/>
                                    </font>
                                </Button>
                            </VBox>

                            <Label styleClass="hint-text" text="Quickly add new content to your collection"/>
                        </VBox>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Watchlist Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="📋 Watchlists">
                    <content>
                        <BorderPane>
                            <top>
                                <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="tab-header">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="10.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="15.0"/>
                                    </padding>
                                    <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="My Watchlists">
                                        <font>
                                            <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0"/>
                                        </font>
                                    </Label>
                                    <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                                        <Button onAction="#createWatchlist" styleClass="primary-button"
                                                text="➕ Create Watchlist"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#deleteWatchlist" styleClass="danger-button"
                                                text="🗑️ Delete Watchlist"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#addToWatchlist" styleClass="secondary-button"
                                                text="📝 Add to Watchlist"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#removeFromWatchlist" styleClass="secondary-button"
                                                text="➖ Remove from Watchlist"/>
                                        <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                        <Label text="Select a watchlist to view its contents" styleClass="hint-text"/>
                                    </HBox>
                                </VBox>
                            </top>
                            <center>
                                <SplitPane dividerPositions="0.3" orientation="HORIZONTAL">
                                    <items>
                                        <VBox spacing="5.0">
                                            <padding>
                                                <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="5.0" top="10.0"/>
                                            </padding>
                                            <Label styleClass="section-title" text="Watchlists:">
                                                <font>
                                                    <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0"/>
                                                </font>
                                            </Label>
                                            <ListView fx:id="watchlistsView" styleClass="watchlist-list"
                                                      VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS">
                                                <placeholder>
                                                    <Label styleClass="placeholder-text"
                                                           text="No watchlists created yet. Click 'Create Watchlist' to get started!"/>
                                                </placeholder>
                                            </ListView>
                                        </VBox>
                                        <VBox spacing="5.0">
                                            <padding>
                                                <Insets bottom="10.0" left="5.0" right="10.0" top="10.0"/>
                                            </padding>
                                            <Label fx:id="watchlistContentTitle" styleClass="section-title"
                                                   text="Watchlist Contents:">
                                                <font>
                                                    <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0"/>
                                                </font>
                                            </Label>
                                            <TableView fx:id="watchlistContentTable" styleClass="main-table"
                                                       VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS">
                                                <columnResizePolicy>
                                                    <TableView fx:constant="CONSTRAINED_RESIZE_POLICY"/>
                                                </columnResizePolicy>
                                                <placeholder>
                                                    <Label styleClass="placeholder-text"
                                                           text="Select a watchlist to view its contents"/>
                                                </placeholder>
                                            </TableView>
                                        </VBox>
                                    </items>
                                </SplitPane>
                            </center>
                        </BorderPane>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Advanced Search Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="🔍 Search">
                    <content>
                        <BorderPane>
                            <top>
                                <VBox spacing="15.0" styleClass="search-header">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="15.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="20.0"/>
                                    </padding>

                                    <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="Advanced Search">
                                        <font>
                                            <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0"/>
                                        </font>
                                    </Label>

                                    <GridPane hgap="15.0" vgap="12.0" styleClass="search-grid">
                                        <columnConstraints>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="NEVER" minWidth="120.0"/>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="NEVER" minWidth="120.0"/>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                        </columnConstraints>
                                        <rowConstraints>
                                            <RowConstraints/>
                                            <RowConstraints/>
                                            <RowConstraints/>
                                            <RowConstraints/>
                                            <RowConstraints/>
                                        </rowConstraints>

                                        <!-- Row 1: Basic Search -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Title:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="titleField" promptText="Start typing for suggestions..."
                                                   styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                                   GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>

                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Genre:" GridPane.columnIndex="2"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>
                                        <ComboBox fx:id="genreCombo" promptText="Select genre..."
                                                  styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="3"
                                                  GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>

                                        <!-- Row 2: People -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Actor:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="actorField" promptText="Enter actor name..."
                                                   styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                                   GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>

                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Director:" GridPane.columnIndex="2"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="directorField" promptText="Enter director name..."
                                                   styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="3"
                                                   GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>

                                        <!-- Row 3: Ratings -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Min IMDB:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="2"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="5" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="2">
                                            <Slider fx:id="minImdbSlider" min="0" max="10" blockIncrement="0.5"
                                                    majorTickUnit="2" minorTickCount="1" showTickMarks="true"
                                                    showTickLabels="true" styleClass="rating-slider"/>
                                            <Label fx:id="minImdbLabel" text="0.0" styleClass="slider-value"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Min User Rating:"
                                               GridPane.columnIndex="2" GridPane.rowIndex="2"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="5" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="3"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="2">
                                            <Slider fx:id="minUserSlider" min="0" max="10" blockIncrement="0.5"
                                                    majorTickUnit="2" minorTickCount="1" showTickMarks="true"
                                                    showTickLabels="true" styleClass="rating-slider"/>
                                            <Label fx:id="minUserLabel" text="0.0" styleClass="slider-value"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <!-- Row 4: Year Range -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Year Range:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="3"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                              GridPane.columnSpan="3" GridPane.rowIndex="3">
                                            <Spinner fx:id="yearFromSpinner" styleClass="year-spinner"/>
                                            <Label text="to" styleClass="range-label"/>
                                            <Spinner fx:id="yearToSpinner" styleClass="year-spinner"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <!-- Row 5: MPAA Rating -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="MPAA Rating:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="4"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                              GridPane.columnSpan="3" GridPane.rowIndex="4">
                                            <CheckBox fx:id="ratingG" text="G" styleClass="rating-checkbox"/>
                                            <CheckBox fx:id="ratingPG" text="PG" styleClass="rating-checkbox"/>
                                            <CheckBox fx:id="ratingPG13" text="PG-13" styleClass="rating-checkbox"/>
                                            <CheckBox fx:id="ratingR" text="R" styleClass="rating-checkbox"/>
                                            <CheckBox fx:id="ratingNC17" text="NC-17" styleClass="rating-checkbox"/>
                                            <CheckBox fx:id="ratingNR" text="NR" styleClass="rating-checkbox"/>
                                        </HBox>
                                    </GridPane>

                                    <!-- Search Controls -->
                                    <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="15">
                                        <Button onAction="#handleSearch" styleClass="primary-button"
                                                text="🔍 Search Movies">
                                            <font>
                                                <Font size="14.0"/>
                                            </font>
                                        </Button>
                                        <Button onAction="#clearSearch" styleClass="secondary-button" text="🗑️ Clear"/>
                                        <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>

                                        <Label text="Sort by:" styleClass="sort-label"/>
                                        <ComboBox fx:id="sortByCombo" styleClass="sort-combo"/>
                                        <fx:define>
                                            <ToggleGroup fx:id="sortOrderGroup"/>
                                        </fx:define>
                                        <ToggleButton fx:id="sortAscButton" text="↑" toggleGroup="$sortOrderGroup"
                                                      styleClass="sort-order-btn" userData="ASC"/>
                                        <ToggleButton fx:id="sortDescButton" text="↓" toggleGroup="$sortOrderGroup"
                                                      styleClass="sort-order-btn" selected="true" userData="DESC"/>

                                        <Label styleClass="hint-text" text="• Real-time suggestions as you type"/>
                                    </HBox>
                                </VBox>
                            </top>

                            <center>
                                <VBox spacing="10.0">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="20.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="10.0"/>
                                    </padding>

                                    <Label styleClass="results-title" text="Search Results:">
                                        <font>
                                            <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0"/>
                                        </font>
                                    </Label>

                                    <ListView fx:id="resultsView" styleClass="results-list" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS">
                                        <placeholder>
                                            <Label styleClass="placeholder-text"
                                                   text="No search results. Use the search form above to find movies."/>
                                        </placeholder>
                                    </ListView>
                                </VBox>
                            </center>
                        </BorderPane>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

            </tabs>
        </TabPane>
    </center>

    <!-- Bottom Status Bar -->
    <bottom>
        <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0" styleClass="status-bar">
            <padding>
                <Insets bottom="8.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="8.0"/>
            </padding>
            <Label styleClass="status-text" text="IMDB Clone - Movie & Series Management"/>
            <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
            <Label styleClass="status-text" text="Ready"/>
        </HBox>
    </bottom>

</BorderPane>

autoAppliedRules.name: Repository Information Overview
autoAppliedRules.content:
--

# IMDB Clone Information

## Summary
A JavaFX-based application that simulates an IMDB-like movie and TV series database. The application allows users to browse, search, and rate movies and TV series.

## Structure
- `src/main/java`: Contains all Java source code
- `src/main/resources`: Contains application resources including data files
- `src/test`: Contains test files
- `.mvn`: Maven wrapper files

## Language & Runtime
**Language**: Java
**Version**: Java 21
**Build System**: Maven
**Package Manager**: Maven

## Dependencies
**Main Dependencies**:
- JavaFX (21.0.3): Controls, FXML, Graphics, Media, Web modules
- ControlsFX (11.2.1): Additional JavaFX controls

**Development Dependencies**:
- JUnit Jupiter (5.10.2): Testing framework

## Build & Installation
```bash
mvn clean install
mvn javafx:run
```

## Project Structure
The application follows an MVC-like architecture:

### Model
- `model/Content.java`: Abstract base class for all media content
- `model/Movie.java`: Represents a movie with title, year, genre, etc.
- `model/Series.java`: Represents a TV series with seasons and episodes
- `model/Actor.java`, `model/Director.java`: Represent people involved in productions
- `model/User.java`: Represents application users

### Data Management
- `data/DataManager.java`: Central class for data loading and management
- `data/SearchCriteria.java`: Used for filtering content in searches

### View/Controller
- `gui/MovieManagementGUI.java`: Main JavaFX application UI

### Enums & Exceptions
- `enums/Genre.java`: Enumeration of content genres
- Various exception classes for error handling

## Issues Fixed
1. Fixed parameter mismatch in Content constructor
2. Implemented Movie constructors to match usage in DataManager
3. Fixed DataManager's loadMovies method
4. Implemented searchMovies method that was returning null
5. Fixed getAllMovies and getAllSeries methods
6. Implemented rateMovie functionality
7. Created missing data directory and sample data files
8. Updated module-info.java with required exports
9. Created main application class
10. Fixed pom.xml configuration

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<?import javafx.geometry.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.text.*?>
<BorderPane prefHeight="700.0" prefWidth="1000.0" styleClass="root" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12"
            xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.papel.imdb_clone.controllers.MainController">

    <!-- Top Menu Bar -->
    <top>
        <MenuBar>
            <menus>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="File">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Import Data"/>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Export Data"/>
                        <SeparatorMenuItem mnemonicParsing="false"/>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Exit"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Edit">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Preferences"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
                <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Help">
                    <items>
                        <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="About"/>
                    </items>
                </Menu>
            </menus>
        </MenuBar>
    </top>

    <!-- Main Content Area -->
    <center>
        <TabPane styleClass="main-tab-pane" tabClosingPolicy="UNAVAILABLE">
            <tabs>

                <!-- Movies Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="🎬 Movies">
                    <content>
                        <BorderPane>
                            <top>
                                <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="tab-header">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="10.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="15.0"/>
                                    </padding>
                                    <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="Movie Collection">
                                        <font>
                                            <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0"/>
                                        </font>
                                    </Label>
                                    <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                                        <Button onAction="#showAddMovieDialog" styleClass="primary-button"
                                                text="➕ Add Movie"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#showRatingDialog" styleClass="secondary-button"
                                                text="⭐ Rate Movie"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#showMovieDetails" styleClass="secondary-button"
                                                text="📋 View Details"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#addToWatchlist" styleClass="secondary-button"
                                                text="📝 Add to Watchlist"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#deleteMovie" styleClass="danger-button" text="🗑️ Delete"/>
                                        <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                        <Label text="Double-click a movie for details" styleClass="hint-text"/>
                                    </HBox>
                                </VBox>
                            </top>
                            <center>
                                <TableView fx:id="movieTable" styleClass="main-table">
                                    <columnResizePolicy>
                                        <TableView fx:constant="CONSTRAINED_RESIZE_POLICY"/>
                                    </columnResizePolicy>
                                    <placeholder>
                                        <Label text="No movies found. Click 'Add Movie' to get started!"
                                               styleClass="placeholder-text"/>
                                    </placeholder>
                                </TableView>
                            </center>
                        </BorderPane>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Series Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="📺 Series">
                    <content>
                        <BorderPane>
                            <top>
                                <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="tab-header">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="10.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="15.0"/>
                                    </padding>
                                    <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="TV Series Collection">
                                        <font>
                                            <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0"/>
                                        </font>
                                    </Label>
                                    <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                                        <Button onAction="#showAddSeriesDialog" styleClass="primary-button"
                                                text="➕ Add Series"/>
                                        <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                        <Label text="Expand series to view seasons and episodes"
                                               styleClass="hint-text"/>
                                    </HBox>
                                </VBox>
                            </top>
                            <center>
                                <TableView fx:id="seriesTable" styleClass="main-table">
                                    <columns>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesTitleColumn" text="Title" prefWidth="200"/>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesYearColumn" text="Year" prefWidth="80"/>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesGenreColumn" text="Genre" prefWidth="120"/>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesSeasonsColumn" text="Seasons" prefWidth="80"/>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesEpisodesColumn" text="Episodes" prefWidth="80"/>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesImdbColumn" text="IMDB Rating" prefWidth="100"/>
                                        <TableColumn fx:id="seriesUserRatingColumn" text="User Rating" prefWidth="100"/>
                                    </columns>
                                    <placeholder>
                                        <Label text="No series found. Click 'Add Series' to get started!"
                                               styleClass="placeholder-text"/>
                                    </placeholder>
                                </TableView>
                            </center>
                        </BorderPane>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Quick Add Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="➕ Quick Add">
                    <content>
                        <VBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="30.0" styleClass="quick-add-container">
                            <padding>
                                <Insets bottom="50.0" left="50.0" right="50.0" top="50.0"/>
                            </padding>

                            <Label styleClass="page-title" text="Quick Add Content">
                                <font>
                                    <Font name="System Bold" size="24.0"/>
                                </font>
                            </Label>

                            <VBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="20.0" styleClass="quick-add-buttons">
                                <Button onAction="#showAddMovieDialog" prefWidth="250.0"
                                        styleClass="large-primary-button" text="🎬 Add New Movie">
                                    <font>
                                        <Font size="16.0"/>
                                    </font>
                                </Button>
                                <Button onAction="#showAddSeriesDialog" prefWidth="250.0"
                                        styleClass="large-primary-button" text="📺 Add New Series">
                                    <font>
                                        <Font size="16.0"/>
                                    </font>
                                </Button>
                            </VBox>

                            <Label styleClass="hint-text" text="Quickly add new content to your collection"/>
                        </VBox>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Watchlist Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="📋 Watchlists">
                    <content>
                        <BorderPane>
                            <top>
                                <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="tab-header">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="10.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="15.0"/>
                                    </padding>
                                    <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="My Watchlists">
                                        <font>
                                            <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0"/>
                                        </font>
                                    </Label>
                                    <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                                        <Button onAction="#createWatchlist" styleClass="primary-button"
                                                text="➕ Create Watchlist"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#deleteWatchlist" styleClass="danger-button"
                                                text="🗑️ Delete Watchlist"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#addToWatchlist" styleClass="secondary-button"
                                                text="📝 Add to Watchlist"/>
                                        <Button onAction="#removeFromWatchlist" styleClass="secondary-button"
                                                text="➖ Remove from Watchlist"/>
                                        <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                        <Label text="Select a watchlist to view its contents" styleClass="hint-text"/>
                                    </HBox>
                                </VBox>
                            </top>
                            <center>
                                <SplitPane dividerPositions="0.3" orientation="HORIZONTAL">
                                    <items>
                                        <VBox spacing="5.0">
                                            <padding>
                                                <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="5.0" top="10.0"/>
                                            </padding>
                                            <Label styleClass="section-title" text="Watchlists:">
                                                <font>
                                                    <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0"/>
                                                </font>
                                            </Label>
                                            <ListView fx:id="watchlistsView" styleClass="watchlist-list"
                                                      VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS">
                                                <placeholder>
                                                    <Label styleClass="placeholder-text"
                                                           text="No watchlists created yet. Click 'Create Watchlist' to get started!"/>
                                                </placeholder>
                                            </ListView>
                                        </VBox>
                                        <VBox spacing="5.0">
                                            <padding>
                                                <Insets bottom="10.0" left="5.0" right="10.0" top="10.0"/>
                                            </padding>
                                            <Label fx:id="watchlistContentTitle" styleClass="section-title"
                                                   text="Watchlist Contents:">
                                                <font>
                                                    <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0"/>
                                                </font>
                                            </Label>
                                            <TableView fx:id="watchlistContentTable" styleClass="main-table"
                                                       VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS">
                                                <columnResizePolicy>
                                                    <TableView fx:constant="CONSTRAINED_RESIZE_POLICY"/>
                                                </columnResizePolicy>
                                                <placeholder>
                                                    <Label styleClass="placeholder-text"
                                                           text="Select a watchlist to view its contents"/>
                                                </placeholder>
                                            </TableView>
                                        </VBox>
                                    </items>
                                </SplitPane>
                            </center>
                        </BorderPane>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

                <!-- Advanced Search Tab -->
                <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="🔍 Search">
                    <content>
                        <BorderPane>
                            <top>
                                <VBox spacing="15.0" styleClass="search-header">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="15.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="20.0"/>
                                    </padding>

                                    <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="Advanced Search">
                                        <font>
                                            <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0"/>
                                        </font>
                                    </Label>

                                    <GridPane hgap="15.0" vgap="12.0" styleClass="search-grid">
                                        <columnConstraints>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="NEVER" minWidth="120.0"/>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="NEVER" minWidth="120.0"/>
                                            <ColumnConstraints hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
                                        </columnConstraints>
                                        <rowConstraints>
                                            <RowConstraints/>
                                            <RowConstraints/>
                                            <RowConstraints/>
                                            <RowConstraints/>
                                            <RowConstraints/>
                                        </rowConstraints>

                                        <!-- Row 1: Basic Search -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Title:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="titleField" promptText="Start typing for suggestions..."
                                                   styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                                   GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>

                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Genre:" GridPane.columnIndex="2"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>
                                        <ComboBox fx:id="genreCombo" promptText="Select genre..."
                                                  styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="3"
                                                  GridPane.rowIndex="0"/>

                                        <!-- Row 2: People -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Actor:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="actorField" promptText="Enter actor name..."
                                                   styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                                   GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>

                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Director:" GridPane.columnIndex="2"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>
                                        <TextField fx:id="directorField" promptText="Enter director name..."
                                                   styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="3"
                                                   GridPane.rowIndex="1"/>

                                        <!-- Row 3: Ratings -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Min IMDB:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="2"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="5" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="2">
                                            <Slider fx:id="minImdbSlider" min="0" max="10" blockIncrement="0.5"
                                                    majorTickUnit="2" minorTickCount="1" showTickMarks="true"
                                                    showTickLabels="true" styleClass="rating-slider"/>
                                            <Label fx:id="minImdbLabel" text="0.0" styleClass="slider-value"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Min User Rating:"
                                               GridPane.columnIndex="2" GridPane.rowIndex="2"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="5" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="3"
                                              GridPane.rowIndex="2">
                                            <Slider fx:id="minUserSlider" min="0" max="10" blockIncrement="0.5"
                                                    majorTickUnit="2" minorTickCount="1" showTickMarks="true"
                                                    showTickLabels="true" styleClass="rating-slider"/>
                                            <Label fx:id="minUserLabel" text="0.0" styleClass="slider-value"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <!-- Row 4: Year Range -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Year Range:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="3"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                              GridPane.columnSpan="3" GridPane.rowIndex="3">
                                            <Spinner fx:id="yearFromSpinner" styleClass="year-spinner"/>
                                            <Label text="to" styleClass="range-label"/>
                                            <Spinner fx:id="yearToSpinner" styleClass="year-spinner"/>
                                        </HBox>

                                        <!-- Row 5: MPAA Rating -->
                                        <Label styleClass="search-label" text="MPAA Rating:" GridPane.columnIndex="0"
                                               GridPane.rowIndex="4"/>
                                        <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1"
                                              GridPane.columnSpan="3" GridPane.rowIndex="4">
                                            <CheckBox fx:id="ratingG" text="G" styleClass="rating-checkbox"/>
                                            <CheckBox fx:id="ratingPG" text="PG" styleClass="rating-checkbox"/>
                                            <CheckBox fx:id="ratingPG13" text="PG-13" styleClass="rating-checkbox"/>
                                            <CheckBox fx:id="ratingR" text="R" styleClass="rating-checkbox"/>
                                            <CheckBox fx:id="ratingNC17" text="NC-17" styleClass="rating-checkbox"/>
                                            <CheckBox fx:id="ratingNR" text="NR" styleClass="rating-checkbox"/>
                                        </HBox>
                                    </GridPane>

                                    <!-- Search Controls -->
                                    <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="15">
                                        <Button onAction="#handleSearch" styleClass="primary-button"
                                                text="🔍 Search Movies">
                                            <font>
                                                <Font size="14.0"/>
                                            </font>
                                        </Button>
                                        <Button onAction="#clearSearch" styleClass="secondary-button" text="🗑️ Clear"/>
                                        <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>

                                        <Label text="Sort by:" styleClass="sort-label"/>
                                        <ComboBox fx:id="sortByCombo" styleClass="sort-combo"/>
                                        <fx:define>
                                            <ToggleGroup fx:id="sortOrderGroup"/>
                                        </fx:define>
                                        <ToggleButton fx:id="sortAscButton" text="↑" toggleGroup="$sortOrderGroup"
                                                      styleClass="sort-order-btn" userData="ASC"/>
                                        <ToggleButton fx:id="sortDescButton" text="↓" toggleGroup="$sortOrderGroup"
                                                      styleClass="sort-order-btn" selected="true" userData="DESC"/>

                                        <Label styleClass="hint-text" text="• Real-time suggestions as you type"/>
                                    </HBox>
                                </VBox>
                            </top>

                            <center>
                                <VBox spacing="10.0">
                                    <padding>
                                        <Insets bottom="20.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="10.0"/>
                                    </padding>

                                    <Label styleClass="results-title" text="Search Results:">
                                        <font>
                                            <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0"/>
                                        </font>
                                    </Label>

                                    <ListView fx:id="resultsView" styleClass="results-list" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS">
                                        <placeholder>
                                            <Label styleClass="placeholder-text"
                                                   text="No search results. Use the search form above to find movies."/>
                                        </placeholder>
                                    </ListView>
                                </VBox>
                            </center>
                        </BorderPane>
                    </content>
                </Tab>

            </tabs>
        </TabPane>
    </center>

    <!-- Bottom Status Bar -->
    <bottom>
        <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0" styleClass="status-bar">
            <padding>
                <Insets bottom="8.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="8.0"/>
            </padding>
            <Label styleClass="status-text" text="IMDB Clone - Movie & Series Management"/>
            <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/>
            <Label styleClass="status-text" text="Ready"/>
        </HBox>
    </bottom>

</BorderPane>

autoAppliedRules.name: Repository Information Overview
autoAppliedRules.content:
--

# IMDB Clone Information

## Summary
A JavaFX-based application that simulates an IMDB-like movie and TV series database. The application allows users to browse, search, and rate movies and TV series.

## Structure
- `src/main/java`: Contains all Java source code
- `src/main/resources`: Contains application resources including data files
- `src/test`: Contains test files
- `.mvn`: Maven wrapper files

## Language & Runtime
**Language**: Java
**Version**: Java 21
**Build System**: Maven
**Package Manager**: Maven

## Dependencies
**Main Dependencies**:
- JavaFX (21.0.3): Controls, FXML, Graphics, Media, Web modules
- ControlsFX (11.2.1): Additional JavaFX controls

**Development Dependencies**:
- JUnit Jupiter (5.10.2): Testing framework

## Build & Installation
```bash
mvn clean install
mvn javafx:run
```

## Project Structure
The application follows an MVC-like architecture:

### Model
- `model/Content.java`: Abstract base class for all media content
- `model/Movie.java`: Represents a movie with title, year, genre, etc.
- `model/Series.java`: Represents a TV series with seasons and episodes
- `model/Actor.java`, `model/Director.java`: Represent people involved in productions
- `model/User.java`: Represents application users

### Data Management
- `data/DataManager.java`: Central class for data loading and management
- `data/SearchCriteria.java`: Used for filtering content in searches

### View/Controller
- `gui/MovieManagementGUI.java`: Main JavaFX application UI

### Enums & Exceptions
- `enums/Genre.java`: Enumeration of content genres
- Various exception classes for error handling

## Issues Fixed
1. Fixed parameter mismatch in Content constructor
2. Implemented Movie constructors to match usage in DataManager
3. Fixed DataManager's loadMovies method
4. Implemented searchMovies method that was returning null
5. Fixed getAllMovies and getAllSeries methods
6. Implemented rateMovie functionality
7. Created missing data directory and sample data files
8. Updated module-info.java with required exports
9. Created main application class
10. Fixed pom.xml configuration

content.text: Now let me update the MainControllerRefactored to set the main controller reference in the movie controller:
Now let me create a summary of what we've accomplished and what files can be removed. Let me first check if there are any login/register controllers that need to be created:

The LoginController and RegisterController are already implemented and don't need methods transferred from MainController. Now let me create a comprehensive summary of the refactoring work completed:

## Summary of Refactoring Completed

### ✅ **Controllers Successfully Refactored:**

1. **MovieController** - Now contains all movie-related functionality:
   - `showAddMovieDialog()` - Complete movie creation dialog
   - `showRatingDialog()` - Movie rating functionality  
   - `showMovieDetails()` - Movie details display
   - `deleteMovie()` - Movie deletion with confirmation
   - `addToWatchlist()` - Integration with watchlist system
   - `refreshMovieTable()` - Data refresh functionality
   - Complete table setup with proper column bindings

2. **SeriesController** - Now contains all series-related functionality:
   - `showAddSeriesDialog()` - Series creation dialog
   - `showSeasonsForSeries()` - Season display dialog
   - `showEpisodesForSeason()` - Episode display dialog
   - `refreshSeriesTable()` - Data refresh functionality
   - Complete table setup with all columns (title, year, genre, seasons, episodes, ratings)

3. **WatchlistController** - Now contains all watchlist-related functionality:
   - `createWatchlist()` - Watchlist creation with dialog
   - `deleteWatchlist()` - Watchlist deletion with confirmation
   - `addToWatchlist()` - Add content to watchlist
   - `removeFromWatchlist()` - Remove content from watchlist
   - `refreshWatchlists()` - Data refresh functionality
   - Complete table setup with content display

4. **MainControllerRefactored** - Now serves as coordinator:
   - `handleSearch()` - Complete search functionality with criteria building
   - `clearSearch()` - Search form clearing
   - `addMovieToWatchlist()` - Cross-controller integration method
   - Proper initialization of all child controllers
   - Search components initialization (genre combo, year spinners, results table)

5. **BaseController** - Already properly implemented with:
   - Common dialog methods (`showError`, `showSuccess`, `showWarning`, `showInfo`)
   - Logging functionality
   - Abstract `initializeController()` method

### ✅ **FXML Files Successfully Updated:**

1. **movie-view.fxml** - Complete movie interface:
   - All movie action buttons (Add, Rate, Details, Add to Watchlist, Delete)
   - Proper table with all columns
   - Modern styling with BorderPane layout

2. **series-view.fxml** - Complete series interface:
   - Series action buttons (Add Series)
   - Full table with all series columns
   - Modern styling with BorderPane layout

3. **watchlist-view.fxml** - Complete watchlist interface:
   - All watchlist action buttons (Create, Delete, Add, Remove)
   - Split pane layout with watchlist list and content table
   - Modern styling with proper placeholders

4. **main-refactored.fxml** - Enhanced main interface:
   - Complete search form with all fields (title, actor, director, ratings, year range)
   - Proper search results table
   - Tab-based navigation using fx:include for modular loading

### ✅ **Integration and Coordination:**

- **Cross-controller communication** implemented (MovieController ↔ MainControllerRefactored ↔ WatchlistController)
- **Data manager injection** properly set up for all controllers
- **Service injection** (WatchlistService) properly configured
- **Stage references** passed where needed for dialog ownership

### 📁 **Files That Can Now Be Removed:**

Since all functionality has been successfully transferred to the specialized controllers, the following files are no longer needed:

1. **MainController.java** - All methods transferred to specialized controllers
2. **main.fxml** - Replaced by main-refactored.fxml with better structure
3. **main-improved.fxml** - Functionality incorporated into main-refactored.fxml

### 🎯 **Architecture Achieved:**

- **Separation of Concerns**: Each controller handles only its domain (movies, series, watchlists)
- **Single Responsibility**: Controllers have focused, single responsibilities
- **Loose Coupling**: Controllers communicate through the main coordinator
- **High Cohesion**: Related functionality grouped together
- **Maintainability**: Code is now easier to maintain and extend
- **Testability**: Individual controllers can be tested in isolation

The refactoring is now complete with a clean, modular architecture where each controller handles its specific domain while the main controller coordinates between them.
